name: Flower Shuriken: Falling Blossoms and Scattering Leaves

This technique will make flowers hover in the air before hardening and spinning at high speeds. The flowers will then be launched at the target. Their hardened state will allow them to cut targets as effectively as metal shuriken.

[[es:Shuriken Floral: Flores Voladoras, Caída de Follaje]]
[[pl:Hana Shuriken: Hikarakuyō]]
